page.shortlink: api client api a5 u array include method

argument.name: array
argument.description: The array to include the item in.

argument.name: item
argument.description: The item to include in the array.

argument.name: index
argument.description: The index to insert the item at if it is unique. A negative value will be offset from the end of the array with "-1" being the last index.

return.name: included
return.description: Is "true" is the item was added to the array.

page.description: Include an item in the array if the new item is unique.
